channel.title: Blog on JimmyLiao
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on JimmyLiao

item.title: Running 2023-10-11
item.description: Time to resume the running, life, and development. Of course, always pick up this book to help me to get the motivation. (the book of “What i talk about when i talk about running” by Haruki Murakami)

item.title: The Blog Declaration of 2023
item.description: Since the beginning of June, I have been thinking about how to plan the personal life record and notes better. This article is a simple explanation of the note system starting from the second half of 2023.

item.title: Change the Hugo theme to BilBerry
